titles.title: To amend the 400 Years of African-American History Commission Act to extend the 400 Years of African-American History Commission, and for other purposes.
To amend the 400 Years of African-American History Commission Act to extend the 400 Years of African-American History Commission, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Reform.

term.name: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

bill.summary: This bill extends the 400 Years of African-American History Commission through July 1, 2023.
